__e: Why, the patient looks perfectly healthy. But then you look at the turd, but really look at it, and then you see the worms crawling around.
What in the hell would my motive be for helping the same bugs I've been trying to kill for two years?
You remember those little worms you saw in the eyes of your first victim?
-Okay, um, I have worms and maybe grace has worms.
Yokn,ana isn't worm food, she's simply moved on to a better place.
Do I get no say on whether my boyfriend tells people he has worms?
- There's no worm in this, right?
- Hmm? My father giving drugs to bugs became a typical moment in my life.
That's a long way with those worms out there.
